briefTitle: Long-Term Safety Study of MT-2412 in Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: Long-term Administration Study of MT-2412 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of co-administration of Teneligliptin (MP-513) and Canagliflozin (TA-7284) once daily for 52 weeks in Japanese patients with Type 2 diabetes mellitus who are receiving treatment with Teneligliptin and have inadequate glycemic control.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
